author: ian_dickinson
msg: Added test for bug report by Christoph Kunz which exposed two problems:
one in reification and one in resource removeAll()

author: chris-dollin
msg: Fixed bug in Polyadic: it's Reifier was misconnected.
Can use the GraphBase default getReifier, hooray.

author: ian_dickinson
msg: Added a fix to removeAll to trap the case that a given statement iterator
is unable to do an in-process remove (which otherwise would cause an
unsupportedoperation exception during removeAll). Chris is concerned
that this fix should be investigated more deeply in the future, so a
TODO item remains in the code.
